LocaleResource.Value:
Please find our LiveEngage LivePerson Chat step by step setup guide detailed below:

  • Create a LivePerson account: https://www.liveperson.com/pricing/custom
  • Sign in: https://authentication.liveperson.net/
  • Select the menu item LiveEngage Tag in the MyAccount dropdown (top right)
  • Copy the Monitoring-Code in the bottom text field
  • Paste the code you just copied into the text field below
